text:
Hehe,
I asked Choco-senpai for the recipe for chocolate curry!
Now I can make Choco-senpai's curry at home!

I see, that's great!
Do you often help out at home, Kaho?

My mom always says,
"Thank you for always helping".

I can't do as much
as everyone else, though...
Chiyoko seems to be especially amazing.

Yeah!
My mom is so efficient and amazing!

I want to be able to cook
like Choco-senpai too!

Kaho, you're diligent and reliable,
so I think you'll get there.

The next time you help out,
give it your all more than usual!
